item.title: 参议员要求美国调查 DeepSeek 的数据安全问题
item.description: 由七位美国共和党参议员组成的小组周二要求商务部评估 DeepSeek 等中国开源人工智能模型带来的潜在数据安全漏洞。【原文：A group of seven Republican U.S. senators on Tuesday asked the Commerce Department to evaluate potential data security vulnerabilities posed by Chinese open-source AI models like DeepSeek.】

item.title: 巴西 BRF 股东批准与 Marfrig 合并
item.description: 据一份证券文件显示，巴西家禽和猪肉加工商 BRF 的股东周三投票通过了与牛肉加工商 Marfrig 合并的提议。【原文：Shareholders in Brazilian poultry and pork processor BRF voted on Wednesday to approve a proposed merger with beefpacker Marfrig , according to a securities filing.】

item.title: 纽约联储第二季度学生贷款问题增加
item.description: 由于越来越多的学生贷款者和一些新购房者面临信贷挑战，第二季度家庭总债务水平有所上升。【原文：Total household debt levels rose during the second quarter as a growing number of student loan borrowers and some newer home borrowers faced rising credit challenges.】

item.title: 巴西经济已做好应对特朗普50%关税的准备
item.description: 巴西从美国进口的商品很快将成为唐纳德-特朗普总统征收的最高关税之一，但由于有大量豁免以及与中国更紧密的贸易关系，这不可能使拉美最大的经济体脱轨。【原文：Brazilian goods imported by the United States will soon carry one of the highest tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, but that will not likely derail Latin America's largest economy, due to ample exemptions and stronger trade ties with China.】

item.title: 对美国经济数据的信任岌岌可危：易失难复
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）解雇美国劳工统计局局长的举动使人们对美国数据报告机制的信任岌岌可危，而人们对世界最大经济体健康状况的可靠诊断的需求却比以往任何时候都大。【原文：Donald Trump's move to fire the head of the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics has put trust in U.S. data reporting mechanisms on the line just as demand for reliable diagnoses of the health of the world's largest economy is bigger than ever.】

item.title: 二叠纪石油前景黯淡，Diamondback 称应成为二叠纪的 "首选整合者
item.description: 页岩钻探公司 Diamondback Energy 周二表示，随着页岩开采活动的放缓，该公司在以 260 亿美元与 Endeavor Energy 合并后将专注于股东回报，因此它仍将是二叠纪盆地的 "首选整合者"。【原文：Shale driller Diamondback Energy said on Tuesday it should remain the Permian Basin's "consolidator of choice" as shale activity slows and the company focuses on shareholder returns following its $26 billion merger with Endeavor Energy.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国最初将对进口药品征收 "小额关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，美国将首先对药品进口征收 "小额关税"，然后在18个月内将关税提高到150%，最终提高到250%，以促进国内生产。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that the United States would initially place a "small tariff" on pharmaceutical imports before hiking it to 150% within 18 months and eventually to 250% in an effort to boost domestic production.】

item.title: 特朗普表示，如果达成贸易协议，他将会见中国国家主席习近平
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，美国即将与中国达成贸易协议，如果协议达成，他将在年底前与中国外长习近平会面。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Tuesday the U.S. was close to a trade deal with China and that he would meet his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping before the end of the year if an agreement is struck.】

item.title: ISM数据显示，7月份美国服务业活动持平
item.description: 7 月份，美国服务业活动出乎意料地表现平平，订单变化不大，就业进一步减弱，即使投入成本攀升至近三年来的最高点，这凸显了特朗普政府关税政策的不确定性对企业的持续拖累。【原文：U.S. services sector activity unexpectedly flatlined in July with little change in orders and a further weakening in employment even as input costs climbed by the most in nearly three years, underscoring the ongoing drag of uncertainty over the Trump administration's tariff policy on businesses.】

item.title: 澳大利亚监管机构称，YouTube 和其他网站对虐待儿童材料 "视而不见
item.description: 澳大利亚互联网监管机构称，全球最大的社交媒体公司仍对其平台上的在线儿童性虐待材料 "视而不见"，并称YouTube尤其对其询问反应迟钝。【原文：Australia’s internet watchdog has said the world’s biggest social media firms are still “turning a blind eye” to online child sex abuse material on their platforms, and said YouTube in particular had been unresponsive to its enquiries.】

item.title: 发电需求激增，康明斯季度收入超出预期
item.description: 美国卡车发动机制造商康明斯公司（Cummins Inc）周二公布的第二季度财报显示，由于发电系统需求强劲，该公司第二季度营收高于华尔街预期，使其股价在早盘交易中上涨了 4%。【原文：U.S. truck engine maker Cummins Inc on Tuesday reported second-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on strong demand for its power generation systems, sending its shares up 4% in early trading.】

item.title: 美国机构批准 OpenAI、谷歌和 Anthropic 列入联邦人工智能供应商名单
item.description: 本周二，美国政府的中央采购部门将 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT、谷歌的 Gemini 和 Anthropic 的 Claude 列入了批准的人工智能供应商名单，以加快政府机构的使用。【原文：The U.S. government's central purchasing arm on Tuesday added OpenAI's ChatGPT, Google's Gemini and Anthropic's Claude to a list of approved artificial intelligence vendors to speed use by government agencies.】

item.title: 富国银行将美国小型股股票评级下调至 "不利 "评级
item.description: 富国银行投资研究所周二将美国小盘股的评级从 "中性 "下调至 "不利"，指出其面临严重的关税风险和盈利疲软。【原文：Wells Fargo Investment Institute on Tuesday downgraded U.S. small-cap equities to "unfavorable" from "neutral", pointing to its heavy tariff exposure and weak earnings.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击美联储，数据完整性影响美元预测：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社周二对外汇分析师进行的一项调查显示，由于对美联储独立性、官方统计数据可信度、财政债务膨胀和降息押注上升的担忧日益加剧，美元在未来几个月将持续走软。【原文：The U.S. dollar will weaken steadily over the coming months on mounting concerns over the Federal Reserve's independence, the credibility of official statistics, ballooning fiscal debt and rising bets on interest rate cuts, a Reuters survey of foreign exchange analysts showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 福克斯公司季度业绩超出预期，回购金额增加 50 亿美元
item.description: 福克斯公司周二公布的季度营收和利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于广告业务、联盟费激增以及免费广告流媒体服务 Tubi 的持续增长。【原文：Fox Corp topped Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue and profit on Tuesday, driven by a surge in advertising, affiliate fee and continued growth at its free ad-supported streaming service, Tubi.】

item.title: 由于货运量和海关费用增加，Expeditors 公布了乐观的业绩
item.description: 本周二，全球货运代理公司 Expeditors International of Washington 公布的第二季度利润和收入均高于华尔街预期，主要得益于空运和海运集装箱量的增加以及更高的海关费用。【原文：Global freight forwarder Expeditors International of Washington reported second-quarter profit and revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, helped by higher airfreight and ocean container volumes and bigger custom fees.】

item.title: 数字医疗公司 eMed 聘用前 X 公司老板琳达-雅卡里诺担任首席执行官
item.description: 数字医疗平台 eMed Population Health 周二表示，已任命社交媒体网站 X 的前首席执行官琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）为首席执行官。【原文：Digital health platform eMed Population Health said on Tuesday it has appointed Linda Yaccarino, the former CEO of social media site X, as its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 研究人员称，发现并修复了可能导致数百万台戴尔笔记本电脑受到攻击的安全漏洞
item.description: 思科Talos公司的研究人员周二表示，用于保护数千万台戴尔笔记本电脑安全的芯片中存在的一个漏洞，可能使攻击者有能力窃取敏感数据，并在安装新操作系统后仍能保持访问权限。【原文：A flaw in the chips used to secure tens of millions of Dell laptops could have given attackers the ability to steal sensitive data as well as maintain access even after a fresh operating system install, researchers with Cisco Talos said Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉、马斯克遭股东起诉Robotaxi索赔
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和特斯拉被股东起诉，指控他们涉嫌证券欺诈，因为他们隐瞒了公司的自动驾驶汽车（包括 Robotaxi）存在重大危险的事实。【原文：Elon Musk and Tesla were sued by shareholders who accused them of securities fraud for concealing the significant risk that the company's self-driving vehicles, including the Robotaxi, were dangerous.】

item.title: 人工智能持续火热，Clay 最新融资估值达 31 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Clay 周二表示，该公司在最新一轮融资中筹集了 1 亿美元，估值达 31 亿美元，投资者继续向人工智能公司投入资金。【原文：AI startup Clay has raised $100 million in its latest fundraising round, the company said on Tuesday, valuing it at $3.1 billion, as investors continue to pour money into artificial intelligence companies.】

item.title: 由于国内需求疲软，前沿集团预计第三季度亏损将超过预期
item.description: 边疆集团（Frontier Group）是折扣航空公司边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）的母公司，该公司周二预测第三季度亏损将超过预期，因为国内旅游需求疲软对票价造成了压力，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 3%。【原文：Frontier Group , parent of discount carrier Frontier Airlines, forecast a bigger-than-expected loss for the third quarter on Tuesday, as soft domestic travel demand weighs on fares, causing its shares to fall 3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美国授予 NioCorp 1000 万美元，用于在内布拉斯加州建立钪供应链
item.description: 美国国防部周二表示，已向埃尔克溪资源公司（Elk Creek Resources）拨款1000万美元，帮助其开发钪供应链，因为华盛顿希望减少对中国关键矿物的依赖。【原文：The U.S. Department of Defense has awarded $10 million to Elk Creek Resources to help develop a scandium supply chain, it said on Tuesday, as Washington looks to reduce reliance on China for critical minerals.】

item.title: 美国 6 月贸易逆差收窄至 602 亿美元
item.description: 由于消费品进口急剧下降，美国 6 月份的贸易逆差有所收窄，这是唐纳德-特朗普总统对进口商品全面征收关税给全球商业造成影响的最新证据。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit narrowed in June on a sharp drop in consumer goods imports, the latest evidence of the imprint on global commerce President Donald Trump is making with sweeping tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: 模块化建筑初创公司 Boxabl 将通过 35 亿美元的 SPAC 交易上市
item.description: 模块化建筑初创公司 Boxabl 将与空头支票公司 FG Merger II 达成 35 亿美元的合并交易，从而在美国上市。【原文：Modular building startup Boxabl will go public in the U.S. through a $3.5 billion merger deal with blank-check firm FG Merger II , the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普将很快宣布美联储任命；贝森特希望留在财政部
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，他将很快宣布关于短期内接替周五宣布辞职的美联储理事阿德里亚娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）的决定，以及下任美联储主席人选。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he would announce decisions soon on a short-term replacement for Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler, who announced her resignation on Friday, as well as his pick for the next Fed chair.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学毕业生创办的人工智能初创公司融资 700 万美元，瞄准中型律师事务所
item.description: 由哥伦比亚大学校友创办、面向中型律师事务所的人工智能初创公司 August 周二表示，该公司在种子轮融资中筹集了 700 万美元，领投方为风险投资公司 NEA 和 Pear VC。【原文：August, an AI startup founded by Columbia University alumni and that caters to midsize law firms, said on Tuesday it had raised $7 million in a seed funding round led by venture capital firms NEA and Pear VC.】

item.title: 动物保健公司 Zoetis 上调年度预期，因宠物产品需求强劲
item.description: 受宠物用药品和疫苗需求强劲的推动，Zoetis 周二上调了年度预期，第二季度业绩超出预期，使这家动物保健公司的股价在盘前交易中大涨约 9%。【原文：Zoetis raised annual forecast and beat second-quarter estimates on Tuesday, driven by strong demand for its medicines and vaccines for pets, sending the animal healthcare company's shares surging about 9% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 汇丰将标普 500 指数年底目标上调至 6400 点，因人工智能蓬勃发展，政策不确定性缓解
item.description: 汇丰银行（HSBC）周二将 S&P 500 指数的年终目标上调了 800 多点，至 6400 点，理由是人工智能带来的欣喜情绪以及美国政策不确定性的缓解。【原文：HSBC on Tuesday raised its year-end S&P 500 index target by more than 800 points to 6400, citing euphoria around artificial intelligence and easing U.S. policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 主营业务需求强劲，Broadridge Financial 季度利润超预期
item.description: 金融科技公司 Broadridge Financial 周二公布的第四季度利润高于华尔街预期，主要得益于投资者沟通产品和全球技术业务的需求。【原文：Fintech firm Broadridge Financial reported fourth-quarter profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, helped by demand for its investor communication offerings and global technology businesses.】

item.title: 智能手机需求复苏缓慢，GlobalFoundries 预测受挫，股价下跌
item.description: 合约芯片制造商 GlobalFoundries 周二预计，第三季度的收入和利润将低于华尔街的预期，因为该公司正在努力应对消费电子市场客户需求的缓慢复苏。【原文：Contract chipmaker GlobalFoundries forecast revenue and profit for the third quarter below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as it grapples with a slow recovery in demand from clients in the consumer electronics market.】
